title: Configuration
para:
If you opted to download the development checkout of &app;, the configure script will not be included. It can be created by running autogen.sh from the source root directory:
./autogen.sh
Note that there are some dependencies for autogen.

All the standard configure options TODO - look up what the standard options are; man configure doesn't work. This text was copied from the existing manual. are available. In addition, &app; has two types of options: those which specify custom paths for development packages which aren't found during the default search, and those which enable or disable features.

The syntax for running configure is as follows:
./configure <options>
The example below shows running configure from the &app; source root directory, with several options specified:
./configure --disable-sound --disable-klash --with-docbook-styles=/opt/local/share/xsl/docbook-xsl --enable-docbook --enable-gui=fltk --enable-renderer=agg
